_header: Overhippers and skippers and mutterers and mumblers
_description: A short interpolation embedded in a prose extract from Rolle’s Form of Living — one 13-line stanza (ababbcbcdeeed)

BodDou302.First Lines:
Ouerhippers and skippers moterers and mumlersTytyuyllis tytild here
                    wordus and takes hem to hys pray…
BodDou302.Last Lines:
…Þai scornen God ful sekyrleAnd han his
                    maleson
BodDou302.Editions:
Fein,  Susanna Greer. 
             “A Thirteen-Line Alliterative Stanza on the Abuse of Prayer from the
                Audelay MS.” 
             Medium Aevum
         63 (1994): 61-74: 63, 68.
